notes.title: Funding
notes.p: This work was supported by POE FEDER 2014-20 of the Conseil Régional de La Réunion (ZIKAlert program, N° SYNERGIE: RE00001902), INSERM-Transfert (project: n°R16029FS), CAPES-COFECUB Me889/17 ZIKANET project and Research Federation BioST, Université de La Réunion. E.C. is supported by a grant DIRED from the Conseil Régional de La Réunion, France. J.-G.H. received funding from the ZIKAlert program. L.S. is supported by the Pasteur Paris University (PPU) International PhD program through an ‘Institut Carnot Pasteur Maladies Infectieuses’ grant.
